subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Colin Montgomerie, Darren Clarke, Paul McGinley, Ian Poulter and Paul Casey are hoping to do enough in the Johnnie Walker Championship in Gleneagles, Scotland, or the Deutsche Bank Championship near Boston to secure one of two wild-card spots on Europe’s Ryder Cup team. Montgomerie, Clarke and McGinley will play in Gleneagles, and Poulter and Casey will play in the United States. The team will defend the trophy at Valhalla in Louisville, Ky., from Sept. 19 to 21.
